column2: didn't quite live up to it.  Service was excellent
column4: but food only OK.  We went on Friday nite and they were out of the dry ribs. Babybacks were over cooked and not much meat.  Pulled pork was good
column5: brisket as well.  Sides were average.  We wanted to check out the buzz since we were in the area
column6: and came away slightly disappointed.  With many other places to choose from
column7: wouldn't go out of my way to go back.
